FROM: ARYACORP PVT. LTD.
DATE & TIME: 14-08-2024 11:18:34   (GMT +5:30)
REFERΕNCE NO: 17691424 


ATTN CHARTERING DESK
DEAR SIR
GOOD DAY
DIRECT OWNERS VESSEL
PLEASE ADVISE SUITABLE CARGO FOR BELOW VESSEL

MV

 C HUNNA  61K/12  MUMBAI (WCI) 16-22 AUGUST 2024,
2X25MT COILS / DECK CARGO - OK
GOA TRANSIT+RED SEA/UKRAINE - OK

FLEXI TRADING EXCLUSIONS
 PREF W/I REGION/INDIA OR TRY SHORT PERIOD OR BOP


********************************************************************** 

  

MV C HUNNA (EX ULTRA ROCANVILLE)

DWT 61,683 MTS ON 12,8M DRFT

BUILT 2012 OSHIMA SHIPBUILDING

GRT/NRT 33,900/20,020

GRAIN 76,913 GRAIN/75,312 BALE

LOA/BEAM 199.98 /32.26 M

TPC: ABT 60.09

5 HO/HA

CRANES: 4 X 30 MT + 4 X 12 CBM GRABS

SPEED /CONSUMPTION:

LADEN ABT 13.50 KNOTS ON ABT 31.00 MT/DAY IFO380 + 0.1 MT MDO/MGO

BALLAST ABT 14.20 KNOTS ON ABT 31.00 MT/DAY IFO380 + 0.1 MT MDO/MGO

ECO SPEED

BALLAST: ABT 11.50 KT ON ABT 19.00 MT + ABT 0.1MT MDO/MGO

LADEN: ABT 11.00 KT ON ABT 20.00 MT + ABT 0.1MT MDO/MGO

IN PORT WORKING/IDLE: ABT 5.00 MT / ABT 2.50 MT

IT IS UNDERSTOOD THAT EVALUATION OF VESSEL’S PERFORMANCE SHALL BASE ON GOOD WEATHER CONDITION I.E. NOT EXCEEDING BF4 AND DSS3 WITH SIGNIFICANT WAVES HEIGHT UPTO AND INCLUDING 1.25M FOR 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS FROM NOON TO NOON, SMOOTH AND CALM SEA WITH NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL AND NO ADVERSE CURRENT, MINIMUM 24 HOURS STEAMING TIME. EXTRAPOLATION OF “GOOD WEATHER” PERFORMANCE TO “BAD WEATHER” PERIOD OR TO ENTIRE VOYAGE IS NOT ALLOWED.  ABOUT GIVE ALLOWANCE OF -0.5 KNOT TO SPEED AND +5% TO BUNKER CONSUMPTION.

AVERAGE SPEED AND AVERAGE CONSUMPTION TO BE CALCULATED FROM SEA BUOY TO SEA BUOY EXCLUDING PERIODS OF SLOW STEAMING ON CHARTERERS ORDER OR FOR REASONS OF SAFETY OR STANDING BY OR ASSISTING ANOTHER VESSEL IN DISTRESS.

THE EFFECTS OF CURRENTS DURING PERIODS OF GOOD WEATHER ARE TO BE EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED FROM THE PERFORMANCE ASSESSMENT.

VESSEL MAY BURN SMALL QTYS OF LSMGO WHEN MANEUVERING IN SHALLOW & NARROW WATERS ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS/IN HEAVY WEATHER/CANAL/RIVER/BALLAST/DEBALLAST ETC.

IT IS AGREED THAT ANY SAVINGS IN CONSUMPTION TO BE OFFSET AGAINST ANY REDUCTION IN SPEED AND ANY SAVING IN TIME TO BE OFFSET AGAINST ANY EXCESS CONSUMPTION. 

ADA 

-ADA-

PLSD TO HEAR.
 
BEST REGARDS,
